summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges incurred by Jeffrey E. Epstein for various packages sent between May 3, 2002, and May 10, 2002. The invoice includes transportation charges, discounts, and details of the recipients of the packages.

keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges incurred by Jeffrey E. Epstein for various packages.
Multiple individuals are listed as senders and recipients of the packages.
The invoice includes specific dates of package pickups and deliveries.
There are significant discounts applied to the shipping charges.
The document reflects Epstein's use of FedEx services for shipping items internationally.
